title: Letterpress class in Philadelphia
content:
Designer Jason Santamaria posted an interesting [blog entry](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215122817/http:/www.jasonsantamaria.com/archive/2006/12/15/return_to_letterpress.php) and a [Flickr gallery](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215122817/http:/flickr.com/photos/jasonsantamaria/sets/72157594416291589/) about letterpress classes at the University of the Arts in Philadelphia.

 [‹ Just in time for the New Year.](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215122817/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30165 "Go to previous forum topic") [When a typeface is no longer a typeface... ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071215122817/http:/www.typophile.com/node/30080 "Go to next forum topic")
author: Manlio Napoli
